TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UIDocumentPickerMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates the types of file transfer operations used by the document picker.

.field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIDocumentPickerMode ExportToService = unsigned int64(2)
